_dump_sw_version.hint.en: Version of the extraction script at the time of processing metadata

_exit_code.hint.en: Exit code of the extraction script

_gromacs_version.hint.en: Version of Gromacs (dump) used to extract metadata

_metadata_date.hint.en: Timestamp of when metadata were extracted

_metadump_version.hint.en: Version of the extraction script at the time of processing metadata

_record_file.hint.en: ID of TPR file (if has ID e.g. from Zenodo or other data repository)

_record_url.hint.en: URL to file if uploaded to data repository

compressibility.hint.en: The compressibility (NOTE: this is now really in bar-1) For water at 1 atm and 300 K the compressibility is 4.5e-5 bar-1

tau_p.hint.en: The time constant for pressure coupling (one value for all directions)

constraint_algorithm.hint.en: Chooses which solver satisfies any non-SETTLE holonomic constraints

rcoulomb.hint.en: The distance for the Coulomb cut-off

rlist.hint.en: Cut-off distance for the short-range neighbor list

nstcomm.hint.en: frequency for center of mass motion removal

nsttcouple.hint.en: The frequency for coupling the temperature.

tau_t.hint.en: The time constant for temperature coupling (one value for all groups)

nr.hint.en: groups to couple to separate temperature baths

rvdw.hint.en: distance for the LJ or Buckingham cut-off

rvdw_switch.hint.en: where to start switching the LJ force and possibly the potential, only relevant when force or potential switching is used

box_size_and_shape.label.en: Size and Shape of simulation box [nm degree]
box_size_and_shape.hint.en: last line of a coordinate file
